ing: 1 1/4 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breasts, pounded to 1/2-inch thickness
1 (16 ounce) jar RaguÂ® Classic Alfredo Sauce
des: "Rotini, chunks of chicken and broccoli florets are tossed in a creamy, lemony Alfredo sauce for a brightly flavored and quick weeknight meal."
ins:
Cook broccoli florets and rotini according to package directions. Set aside.
Spray both sides of chicken with olive oil and evenly sprinkle with lemon pepper chicken.
Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in large skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken in skillet until cooked through, about 4 minutes per side (instant-read thermometer reads 165 degrees F). Remove chicken from skillet; cut into cubes and keep warm.
Wipe out skillet and return it to stove. Stir together Ragu(R) Classic Alfredo sauce, lemon zest, and lemon juice in skillet. Heat over medium-low heat until warmed through, stirring occasionally. Add pasta, broccoli, and chicken to skillet, and stir to combine. Cook until heated through.
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.
